description: Once associated with herbal soups, TCM ingredients are now highly sought after in the beauty industry. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Rise of C-beauty: Traditional Chinese medicine remedies inspiring more cosmetics, skincare products
title_page: Rise of C-beauty: Traditional Chinese medicine remedies inspiring more cosmetics, skincare products | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – It may seem hard to believe, but the creator of a skincare line based on traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) knew little about it at first.
“I was not familiar with TCM at all. My only knowledge of it was through the herbal tonic soups my grandmother used to brew for me when I was growing up,” says former pharmacist Serene Ang, 44, who founded Serene SkinLab in 2019.
